title: Clubhouse, Fitness Center, Enclosed Dog Area, Pool
posting_body: ['Sharon Green Menlo Park, managed by Sares-Regis Residential', '350 Sharon Park Drive', 'Menlo Park, CA 94025', 'show contact info', 'Sharon Green is a modern, fully renovated apartment community in the heart of Menlo Park and close to Palo Alto, Stanford University, Stanford Hospital, Marguerite shuttle.', 'Call today and schedule a virtual tour!', 'This three bedroom two bathroom apartment features a fully equipped chef-style kitchen with stainless steel appliances and Quartz countertops.', 'This unit also features and entry closet, washer/dryer, master suite, and a patio with a storage closets!', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Monday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Tuesday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Wednesday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Thursday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Sunday 10:00am - 5:00pm', 'Apartment Features', '* Central Heat and Air', '* Fireplace', '* Disposal', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Gas Stove', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* High Efficiency Lighting Fixtures', '* Wood-Like Floors', '* Full sized Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Breakfast Bar', '* Walk-in Closet', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Quartz Countertops', '* Direct Access to Apartment from Garage', '* Nest Thermostat', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Kitchen Island', '* Window Coverings', '* Extra Storage', 'Community Features', '* Professionally Managed', '* Free Shuttle to the University', '* Controlled Access', '* TV Lounge', '* WiFi Access', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Bark Park', '* Reserved Parking', '* Credit Cards Accepted', '* Covered Parking', '* Basketball Court', '* Community Lounge', '* Elevator', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Package Acceptance', '* Community Kitchen', '* Swimming Pool', '* Playground', '* Fitness Studio', '* Guest Parking', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Bocce Ball', '* Hiking and Biking Trails', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Garage Parking', '* Bike Racks', '* Tennis Court', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* EV Charging', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Spa']
